experience.title: CLOUD SOFTWARE ENGINEER
desc: Still fairly new at the job, will update once I'm more experienced!

experience.title: AWS TECHNICAL INTERN
desc: Revamped an internal tool using AWS services including: S3, Amplify, SSO, Cognito, WAF & Shield, API Gateway, Lambda, SNS, CodeBuild, CodeCommit, CodePipeline, DynamoDB, CloudWatch, CloudTrail, and CloudFormation.

experience.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEERING INTERN
desc: A 'brain robotics' company focused on the practical usages of EEG headbands in training focus and relaxation for students and athletes, as well as reinventing AI-powered prosthetic arms for amputees.
Created cross-platform games / exercises in React.js and Node.js built on Electron.js.
Coordinated with the design team in drafting and implementing UI/UX mockup designs.
Updated the company website with Vue.js.

hackathons.title: 1st Place Best Hack Award
desc: Rosetta Kart uses Bose Frames as a wearable game controller in a MarioKart inspired language learning app! In this demo, the player hears English instructions over the Frames, and steers the Karts with head tilts/turns to drive through blocks with Mandarin characters matching up to their English counterparts!

hackathons.title: Winner of Microsoft Azure Champ Challenge
desc: Built a ChatBot web app that checks up on grandparents (elderly) acting as a concerned grandchild, identifies early-on the potential health symptoms they may be exhibiting, encourages them to lead an active lifestyle, and stays connected to their families through help of social media.
Project created with Node.js and EJS, hosted using Azure’s Web App and DevOps services, connected to GitHub repository with a CI/CD pipeline on Azure.
Created 3D facial scans as stand-in grandchild during conversations using Apple’s ARKit and CoreML.

hackathons.title: Winner of Best Use of Google Cloud Platform
desc: Built a Machine Learning Model that identifies breed combinations of mix-bred dogs and cats to help raise adoption rates in animal shelters using Google Cloud AutoML Vision.
Achieved an accuracy rate of 97.04% with the custom-trained model, a 3.259% improvement from using the pre-trained model of Google Cloud Vision API.
Built a web UI with REST API that executes Serverless Application Scripts stored on Google Cloud Functions.
